figure_1.title: Fig. 1.
figure_1.caption: Biotea model mapped to schema.org. Following Bioschemas approach, minimum, recommended, and optional properties are proposed (only the former two included in the diagram).

claims.sentence: An overview of our Biotea mapping to Bioschemas is shown in Fig. 1.
In Fig. 2 we show the markup corresponding to PMC-OA article identified as PMC2628047, the corresponding URL is http://biotea.github.io/bioschemas?pmc=2628047.
